question: You recently spent a night in a hotel and had to put up with a great deal of noise very early in the morning because of a faulty central heating system. The manager promised to contact you regarding compensation but you still haven't heard from him.Write a letter to the hotel. In the letterdescribe the problem at the hotelexplain what the manager had said at the timesay what you want the manager to do.
text: I am writing to enquire about the complaint raised to your manager, Mr Tom Cruise, regarding the central heating system of room 501, I was staying using on 22 Dec 2022. At that time, he had assured me of compensation but I have not received it to this day.

While coming from a distant village, I thought to take ample rest before my next day-long flight to Chicago. But to my surprise, a horrible noise was coming out of the heating system because of which I was not able to fall asleep. Needless to say, I was furious as I was tired and restless.

I then called your front desk and since no other room was available, a handyman came to put a temporary covering on the appliance to reduce the sound a little. It did not help much and hence, he agreed to pay compensation along with spa gift certificates for the troubles I faced because of the noisy went.

I expect Mr Cruise's promise to be fulfilled, and request spa gift vouchers to be sent to my email: [email protected] If not, I will contact the General manager of the hotel through the contact form on the website and complain about what happened here.
